name: Venus
description: The second planet from the Sun, know for its extreme temperatures and thick atmosphere.

name: Mars
description: The fourth planet from the Sun, know as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

name: Saturn
description: The sixth planet from the Sun, famous for its stunning ring system.

name: Pluto
description: Far away from here there is a dwarf planet in the lies on the frozen edge of our Solar System, with a icy surface and eccentric orbit.

name: Mercury
description: The closest planet to the Sun, characterized by its swift orbit and cratered surface.

name: Tellus
description: Our home planet, also known as Earth. Teeming with life and diverse ecosystems, orbiting the Sun in perfect harmony.

name: Jupiter
description: The king of planets, Jupiter is a massive, swirling giant, with a Great Red Spot large enough to swallow Earth and over 75 moons.

name: Neptune
description: A distant blue giant the eight planet from the Sun, Fierce winds and icy storms make it realm of relentless,powerful tempests.

name: Uranus
description: The seventh planet from the Sun, unique for its sideways to rotation and faint rings.
